snippet: A draft of a new national security strategy called for building even closer ties with the United States, but also said Japan must “strengthen its own capabilities.”
abstract: Draft of Japan's new national security strategy calls for country to seek a larger regional role as balance of power shifts with the rise of China and the decline of American influence; calls for closer military ties with United States.
lead_paragraph: A draft of a new national security strategy called for building even closer ties with the United States, but also said Japan must “strengthen its own capabilities.”

headline.main: Draft of Security Plan Calls for a Muscular Japan
headline.print_headline: Draft of Security Plan Calls for a Muscular Japan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
